content.title: Software Developer, Student - Hybrid
details: Researched, Developed and Documented requirements and steps taken to achieve modern Spring Boot services following standard RESTful practices. Organized best practices to be followed by developers when working with Spring Boot for current and future projects. Resulted in much more efficient REST API applications and better code maintainability.

Developed and Maintained many MonoRepo integrated systems managing docker builds and automated Gitlab CICD services. Automatically deployed service statistics to Kafka and Elastic for delegating tasks throughout the business team. This resulted in efficient and quick service delivery within the business.

Monitored and quicky completed JIRA Tickets thus continuing to achieve an overall 99.5% service uptime for customers and business units demonstrating strong time management skills. Also, designed automated ticketing services to alert developers when errors occur in production resulting in a much more efficient process of repairing system errors.

Gathered client requirements and lead a team of developers to produce modern full stack services making use of multiple frameworks to achieve automated internal commissioning and deployment of server hardware.

content.title: Software Developer Intern
details: Was originally hired as a Co-Op student
I was hired as a Part-Time employee in their Business Sector
This allowed me to continue getting my degree while working with them
I was onboarded and shown UIPath, a Robotic Automation Software
UIPath is used to replicate human interaction with a computer
It is usually used for automating data entry, emails, and other simple tasks
My task was to convert their Data Library from using Screen-Clicks to using API Calls
This allowed software using the library to complete their tasks much quicker without needing to wait for all the different interactions to occure
